title: Meta's AI guru LeCun: Most of today's AI approaches will never lead to true intelligence
description: Fundamental problems elude many strains of deep learning, says LeCun, including the mystery of how to measure information.

title: To alleviate DevOps skills issues, we need more AI skills, ironically
description: Infusing artificial intelligence into DevOps will alleviate a lot of headaches. Of course, this means working with AI.

title: United Airlines wants you to believe it's sexy (its employees don't like that)
description: For your next business trip, you'll surely consider United now. Or will you?

title: Slow internet at home? This adapter is the key to faster wired connectivity
description: Review: NexusLink's G.HN Wave 2 kit offers a slick way to repurpose your untethered coaxial cables to provide fast, reliable wired connectivity in your home.

title: The 5 best Halloween projectors of 2022
description: Beware of our picks for the best Halloween projector. They'll make your home the one to beat in the neighborhood this fall.
